column2:
pron
  1. I (personal pronoun)
  2. me (direct object of a verb)
  3. me (object of a preposition)
  4. me (indirect object of a verb)
  5. my (belonging to me)

det
  1. this (the (thing) here)
  2. this (known (thing) just mentioned)
  3. this (known (thing) about to be mentioned)
  4. this (known (thing) that the speaker does not think is known to the audience)

pron
  1. this (The thing, item, etc. being indicated)

adj
  1. left (the west side of the body when one is facing north)

adj

verb

  1. old (of a living being: having lived for relatively many years)

adj
  1. left (the west side of the body when one is facing north)

verb
  1. to move (to change place or posture; to go)

noun

noun
  1. child (a female or male child, a daughter or son)

noun

noun

verb

noun

noun

noun

noun

verb

noun
  1. hair (filament which grows on the human head)

noun
  1. weevil that infests wood, bamboo, and rice

noun
  1. cataract of the eye
  2. hazy or blurred vision

noun

noun

verb
  1. to give (transfer the possession of something to someone else)

  2. ancient

adv

verb
  1. to warm up, to heat

verb
  1. (transitive) to smell (sense a smell or smells)

verb

  2. to send;
  3. to return;

  5. to gift of food at a wedding;

verb
  1. (intransitive) to dream (see imaginary events while sleeping)

noun

verb

verb
  1. to see (perceive with the eyes)

  1. to set free, to let loose, to be liberated

  1. (intransitive) to turn (move around an axis through itself)

verb
  1. (Western Malayo-Polynesian) to float (drift gently through the air)

noun
  1. pestle (instrument used with a mortar to grind things)

verb

verb
